title: Hallelujah: Unmei no Sentaku
synopsis: The story is set in the ungoverned Tokyo shortly after a mysterious power outage incident. Those who survived from the incident had to protect themselves from the mob.
voices: ['Hanae, Natsuki', 'Yashiro, Taku', 'Matsukaze, Masaya', 'Tomita, Miyu', 'Suzuki, Eri', 'Kumagai, Kentarou', 'Hasegawa, Ikumi']
staff: [['Kamei, Kanta', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aketagawa, Jin', ['Sound Director']], ['Shirai, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Uezu, Makoto', ['Script']]]
